text.textblock: Pursuant to section 10(a)(2) of the Federal Advisory Committee Act (Pub. L. 92-463, 5 U.S.C. Appendix I), notice is hereby given for the availability of the following two new documents:

•RTCA/DO-219, Minimum Operational Performance Standards for ATC Two-Way Data Link Communications. Prepared by Special Committee 169 and approved by the Technical Management Committee (TMC) on August 27, 1993.

•RTCA/DO-220, Minimum Operational Performance Standards for Airborne Weather Radar with forward-looking windshear capability. Prepared by Special Committee 173 and approved by the Technical Management Committee (TMC) on September 21, 1993.

Persons wishing to present statements or obtain information should contact the RTCA Secretariat, 1140 Connecticut Avenue, NW., suite 1020, Washington, DC 20036; (202) 833-9339. Any member of the public may present a written statement to the committee at any time.
Issued in Washington, DC, on December 28, 1993.

doctitle.textblock: RTCA, Inc.; Two New Documents Available
